value.condition: Window.Isvisible(videos) + Window.IsActive(Custom_1101_homewidgets.xml)
Window.IsActive(Custom_1103_categoryinfo.xml) + [Control.HasFocus(9000) | Control.HasFocus(400)]
Window.IsActive(Custom_1106_categoryinfolist.xml) + [Control.HasFocus(9000) | Control.HasFocus(400)]
Window.IsActive(script-ExtendedInfo Script-YoutubeList.xml)
Skin.HasSetting(EnableGenreArtworks) + Container.Content(genres) + !String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,videodb://tvshows/)
Skin.HasSetting(EnableGenreArtworks) + Container.Content(genres)
[Container.Content(Albums) | Container.Content(Songs)] + !String.IsEmpty(Container.Art(artist.fanart))
Container.Content(Artists) + !String.IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(Fanart_Image))
